com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc

Class CommandLineHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc.CommandLineHelper

  • public final class CommandLineHelper
extends Object
    This class helps to process command-line arguments. It uses JCommander library for processing of command-line arguments.

    Instantiability: forbidden.
    Thread safety: thread-safe.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams
      This class defines possible application command-line arguments as described in JCommander documentation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams getCommandLineParams(String[] args)
      Processes command-line arguments and returns an object that contains processed values of arguments.
      static void printAgentUsageAndExit(ParameterException cause)
      Prints usage and terminates application.
      static void printAppUsageAndExit(ParameterException cause)
      Prints usage and terminates application.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandLineParams

        public static final CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams getCommandLineParams(String[] args)
        Processes command-line arguments and returns an object that contains processed values of arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments of the application. Must be not null.
        Returns:
        Object that contains values of processed command-line arguments.

      • printAgentUsageAndExit

        public static final void printAgentUsageAndExit(ParameterException cause)
        Prints usage and terminates application. This method should be called if ParameterException occurred during processing of Java-agent command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        cause - Exception that caused invocation of the method. Must be not null.

      • printAppUsageAndExit

        public static final void printAppUsageAndExit(ParameterException cause)
        Prints usage and terminates application. This method should be called if ParameterException occurred during processing of application command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        cause - Exception that caused invocation of the method. Must be not null.
